text: Juiced is a racing video game has been published by THQ, and developed by Juiced Games. Released in 2005 in North America and Europe (except Japan in 2006 by Sega). Released on console PlayStation 2 and Xbox. == Sequel == The two sequel called Juiced: Eliminator released in 2006 exclusively for PlayStation Portable, and also Juiced 2, released at the same console in 2007. Category:2005 video games Category:THQ games Category:Mobile games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Street racing video games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: Juiced (video game)
